_header: O Michael by grace of Christ Jesu
Subjects: prayers, to guardian angel; Michael the archangel, saint
_description: ?John Lydgate, ‘A prayere to seynt Michaell’ — one 8-line stanza (ababbcbc)

BodLauMis683.First Lines:
O myghell by grace of cryst Ihesucallid among angelis þe
                    hevenly champioun…
BodLauMis683.Last Lines:
…Dyffende our party presente our orisounvp to the lord that
                    gouerneth all
BodLauMis683.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 133.
